Title: Zingerman's Delicatessen

Zingerman’s Deli Printable Menu

Zingerman’s Deli

422 Detroit Street

Ann Arbor, MI 48104
Open everyday 11am-7pm
734-663-3354

When placing your order, please inform us if you have a food allergy. We want to make sure our product is tasty and safe for you to
consume! If you need to know more about any ingredients, just call us at 734-663-3354.

Sandwich of the Month

Sandwich of the Month - Lillian & Izzy's "Too Spicy" BarbeCuban
This month's Sandwich of the Month, Lillian & Izzy's "Too Spicy" BarbeCuban, is brought to you by the Noel family and a generous gift to
the Leslie Science and Nature Center. The Noels - Ryan, Alexa, Lillian, Izzy and their dog Zoey - love Ann Arbor, UofM, the Sleeping Bear
Sand Dunes in Glen Arbor ... and sandwiches! Admittedly, this sandwich creation leans more towards the parents’ taste preferences
(spicy!) than the kids, but given the family food motto of "Don't Yuck My Yum", the kids supported their parents' and the BarbeCuban
became a reality! Hand-pulled spicy Cuban-style pork is topped with BBQ sauce, Vermont cheddar cheese, fire-roasted New Mexico
green chiles and tangy cole slaw. This is all sandwiched between 2 slices of grilled Rustic Italian bread from Zingerman's Bakehouse.
Lillian & Izzy's "Too Spicy" BarbeCuban is available every day in November.

$17.99

Jewish Rye bread from Zingerman's Bakehouse.

Description: Locals line up for generous deli sandwiches at this funky, longtime market with specialty groceries.

parking: Somewhat difficult to find a space

summary.snippet: "Small ny style deli, staff paid well, fun place to bring people, best breads"
"An awesome deli great food portions atmosphere ambience and location"
"Good selection of sandwiches, pork, beef, chicken, vegetarian."

most_relevant.description: I love these kinds of places: lively, friendly, and unique. Your eyes are filled with the endless possibilities of which direction to go the moment you walk in the door. So much to take in - it made me smile from the get-go.   The sandwich was delicious - you do pay a little extra for the freshness - but it was well worth it. Quality all the way. I was a little confused about the ordering system, but someone was there to assist me. Once you've done it, the second time will be easy.  Would recommend stopping by if you are in the Ann Arbor area.

I’m not sure where to start with Zingerman’s, because they literally have it all. First the sandwiches: they are amazing. I got the TNT Cowboy Reuben, which was top-notch. The bread was unique, and the meat was high quality. The flavor springs out at you. They make their own candy, shirts, meats, books (yes books), water bottles, chips, and anything you can think of in between. They also have a really nice outside seating area. The staff was nice and energetic. This is a really well-known spot around campus in A2! I heard a lot about Zingerman’s on campus, then came here, and now understand what the hype is all about.

The sandwiches are amazing. I got Reuben. The bread was unique, and the quality of meat was fresh and great. They make their own candy, shirts, meats, baking books, water bottles, chips... The staff was friendly and nice. This spot is a really well-known.

No introduction needed for this establishment in Ann Arbor.  Well organized to handle large crowd but great advice from a friend to order online before heading there for lunch as it was games weekend.  Sandwiches are so creative, fresh and amazing!

Just had my best sandwich that I have never had since sometime. The taste and mixture of the sandwich make it very unique and remarkable, the people are also so friendly there. I would urge all Ann Arbor visitors or residents to try it.

Zingerman's Deli in Ann Arbor is a gastronomic treasure trove that never fails to impress, but it's their pastrami Reuben that truly steals the show. From the moment you step inside, the vibrant, bustling atmosphere is a prelude to the culinary delight that awaits.

The pastrami Reuben is a masterclass in sandwich artistry. Each bite is a harmonious blend of tender, perfectly spiced pastrami, tangy sauerkraut, creamy Russian dressing, and melted Swiss cheese, all nestled between slices of their signature rye bread. The balance of flavors and textures is impeccable, making every mouthful an unforgettable experience.

What sets Zingerman's apart is their commitment to quality. The ingredients are top-notch, and you can taste the care and expertise in every component of the sandwich. It's no wonder locals and visitors alike rave about this iconic deli. Whether you're a sandwich aficionado or just looking for an exceptional meal, Zingerman's pastrami Reuben is a must-try. Prepare to be dazzled!

This place was amazing. We ate at the location off Jackson. They were very accommodating with gluten free foods, as I have an allergy. The taste was great. The service was superb. This was 5 stars across the board. Highly recommend.  We would eat here again.

What an experience at Zingerman’s, this is a must stop in Ann Arbor! Amazing sandwich selection and the bread is perfect. I am a big sucker for corned beef and pastrami and theirs is better than your typical Jewish deli.

They also have a number of other grocery and deli items that you can purchase, it’s a very cool spot!
